rows.label: tlk45450161_02_msg0001
rows.name:
I've seen you in Rigitte Harbor before,
haven't I? You seem stronger than you
were before, though.

rows.label: tlk45450161_01_msg0002
rows.name:
When you leave this port and head for
Baldotas Isle, the path splits in two.

rows.label: tlk45450161_02_msg0003
rows.name:
The left-hand path is the safest route
to Iyasaki Village...

rows.label: tlk45450161_02_msg0004
rows.name:
But if you want to really test your skills,
you could try heading right instead!
Just...don't blame me if you regret it.
